original_question: Thermophobia is the abnormal fear of what?

pred_ans: Thermophobia is the abnormal fear of heat or temperature.
pred_ans_conf_MCQ: Thermophobia is the abnormal fear of heat
pred_ans_conf_NL_MCQ: Thermophobia is the abnormal fear of heat
pred_ans_conf_OE: Thermophobia is the abnormal fear of heat.
pred_diverse_ans: Thermophobia is an abnormal fear of heat or temperature.
Someone with thermophobia is afraid of heat or high temperatures.
Thermophobia is known as an abnormal fear of heat or temperature.
A person with thermophobia fears irrationally high temperatures or heat.
Thermophobia refers to the specific phobia of heat or temperature.
The focus of the fear for someone diagnosed with thermophobia is extreme heat or temperature.
Thermophobia is the irrational fear of heat or temperature.
